job_title: Java Full stack Developer with APIs in Rally and Clarity tools Exp.
jd: From: Manish Kumar, Scalable Systems manish.kumar@scalable-systems.com Reply to: manish.kumar@scalable-systems.com Position: Java Full stack Developer with APIs in Rally and Clarity tools Exp.Location: Hartford, CTWe are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior Full Stack Developer with expertise in Rally, JavaScript, React, Node.js, AWS Lambda, and Chart.js. The ideal candidate should have 5+ years of development experience, with a strong background in creating APIs in Rally and Clarity tools. You will play a critical role in designing, developing, and maintaining a React-based standalone reporting application hosted on AWS. This application will extract and consolidate data from various sources (Rally API, Clarity API, workforce management tools, and Apptio) to provide insightful reporting to agile, business, and financial leaders, Best Regards Manish Kumar Phone - +17327883626 Email ID: manish.kumar@scalable-systems.com Scalable Systems | Inspiring Innovation Big Data | Analytics | Integration | Intelligence www.scalable-systems.com
